h2_title: Elder Amourworm Boss Fight and Guide
content: If you find yourself having trouble avoiding getting poisoned, consider using the Pillar Stance to boost yourself up off the ground.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Amourworm.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Amourworm', specifically from the subsection 'Elder Amourworm Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you find yourself having trouble avoiding getting poisoned, consider using the Pillar Stance to boost yourself up off the ground.
